text: Watan Ramalãna ne wanda aka saukar da Alƙur'ãni a cikinsa yana shiriya ga mutãne da hujjõji bayyanannu daga shiriya da rarrabẽwa. To, wanda ya halarta daga gare ku a watan, sai ya azumce shi, kuma wanda ya kasance majinyaci ko kuwa a kan tafiya, sai ya biya adadi daga wasu kwanuka na dabam. Allah Yana nufin sauƙi gare ku, kuma ba Ya nufin tsanani gare ku, kuma dõmin ku cika adadin, kuma dõmin ku girmama Allah a kan Yã shiryar da ku, kuma tsammãninku, zã ku gõde
